entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023
